website_summaries.verdict: Small liquid filled bait stations that work quickly and efficiently to attract and kill ants.
pros: Covered bait station can be used on countertops, cupboards, cabinets, shelves,  under sinks, or wherever ants are found in the house
Ants eat the bait and take it back to the colony and feed it to them as well
cons: The bodies of some dead ants may have to be swept up from time to time

customer_reviews.title: Ant Killa'!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works wonderfully against common ants. In fact, it works TOO well where the bait kills them almost instantly instead of bringing the poison back into their nest and wiping out the rest of the colony. I put the bait in the high traffic area on my window sill and within 24 hours I had a bait tray full with dead ants inside. I ended up using additional baits in the same location to get rid of the remaining ants as the initial bait trap was too full for ants to even enter into the bait. But it got the job done eventually.
customer_reviews.author: BOSU

customer_reviews.title: Your ants are safe with this product on the job
customer_reviews.text: This product absolutely did not work. Ants would enter the baits and some would get stuck in there but there was absolutely no reduction in the trails of ants coming to and from my plants. I had success when I stopped using this product and switched to Grants Ant Stakes
customer_reviews.author: K. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Ants Party at the Punch Bowl
customer_reviews.text: Because the ants were hanging out in my bathroom sink, I placed one of these clear plastic traps in the sink before I went the bed. The ants were quickly elbowing (do they have elbows?) each other out of the way to get into the trap and drink the insecticide-laced elixir. 24 hours later: no ants to be seen! Be sure to snap, not twist, the tab off. Also, be sure to keep the traps right-side-up and level or the liquid bait will run out.
customer_reviews.author: Richard B.

customer_reviews.title: Works with Patience
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best ant killer I've used. Place it where ants enter and wait patiently. The ants go in and take some "food" back to their queen, which eventually rids your house of ants. The few ants that eat while gathering will die inside the trap. Since new colonies of ants can move into your house territory overnight, I place these in the spring, where I know the ants typically enter and leave them there until winter when the ants are not active. I have two cats who are not interested in these, but I would be cautious with dogs (since dogs eat anything.)
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: TERRO T-300-3
customer_reviews.text: This product had NO EFFECT inside my home. I have thousands of very, very small baby ants that could not reach the opening in the bait pack. These ants are almost microscopic. It may work very well for medium and larger ants. I even tried pouring some of the liquid onto a counter surface. It did attract some ants however the liquid became hard after a few hours. This is my experience only, you may have better results.
customer_reviews.author: Fredfire

customer_reviews.title: This Ant Killer Works
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd Time I needed to use Ant Killer since we bought this house, the 1st time was 2010, the kitchen had 2 or 3 different ant colonies and we used this same product then, and a week or two later no more ants. Roll ahead to 2019, springtime, warm temps, Ants started showing up again, they were scouts, purchased a fresh box of the Terro T300-3 pack, it took 2 to 3 weeks, no more ants. I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: deltadude

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: We had a bad Pharoh ant problem, but I tossed several of these traps around the kitchen and I haven't seen an ant in a few months. It does take a few weeks to completely eradicate the ants, though. You'll notice fewer and fewer as time goes by. Then one day, you'll wonder when the last time you saw an ant was. This stuff is like candy to them. I would see maybe a dozen ants throughout a day, but put in the right places (like in their travel paths) I saw them swarm the traps by the hundreds. It was fascinating and yet horrifying at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Heather L.

customer_reviews.title: Worked fast and easy. I almost felt bad for them.
customer_reviews.text: I've had a bit of an ant problem for years. It started escalating quickly this year so I decided to actually try to do something about it. I got the three package deal. If I hadn't used them wrong (I put them down upside down so most of the ants that got in drowned) I would only have needed half of one package (three units total) to knock them down completely. I went ahead and put three down the right way, and the problem is completely gone. It took maybe three days. I'll leave them in place for a while to make sure the colony is gone, but I call it a complete success.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: killed 'em
customer_reviews.text: Worked well on attracting an killing ants. Did clog up but that was from the cluster of dead ant bodies around the opening. My one complaint was that these do not snap open as indicated and if you try to accomplish that you end up with them partly open and the contents on you !! We finally resorted to cutting the tops off with scissors then washing the scissors well after.
customer_reviews.author: dappy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: We had such a serious ant problem from all the rain that occurred and the ants coming in like crazy. So I took these little bates and put them in the subbasement of our house. The ants decided to go to the sub basement and have disappeared in the whole entire summer. I highly recommend this product but make sure that you put it in a place where you don’t have to worry about seeing ants because it really does attract the ants and Send the poison back to the colony and kill them
customer_reviews.author: Eye

customer_reviews.title: Attracts ants the best of all baits
customer_reviews.text: Only ant bait I have tried that works. You can tell because of all the dead ants surrounding it and in it. The only caveat (and it does warn you) is to avoid tilting the bait because the liquid will drip out. I had a huge ant problem since I am over a crawlspace and still have too many entry points, but this bait definitely takes care of almost all the ants. Sometimes, I don't see an ant for a whole week! I heartily recommend this bait over all others, especially over the solid baits. Liquid baits work better.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Allen

customer_reviews.title: "A few more ants" became an infestation of hundreds
customer_reviews.text: After setting one on the counter in a corner frequented by an occasional ant after two days we were invaded by a swarm of hundreds of big black ants. In the past, we've only had the tiny ones but this time, as described, it drew more ants than usual...and big ants we've never had a problem with. There were so many that some died filling up the traps, others piled on dead ants outside and the sheer number of ants depleted the solution in the trap, leaving a sweet sticky trail outside which seemed to attract even more. Only way I could clear them out was with my shop vac.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Remarkably effective!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works! This product worked well for the smaller ants that parade into our house but I was very sceptical it would work for the large carpenter ants that come in through the roof and devour our wooden beams. They’ve been nesting there for years and are well established. We’ve tried everything short of tenting the house. Within hours of putting the Terro out they were gone. It’s only been a few days and I suspect they’ll be back, but I will happily keep buying this stuff if it keeps them under control.
customer_reviews.author: Humble Traveller

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was working on a patient at her hospital that happened to be a pest control specialist. We’ve had professionals spray our house for ants twice but still have ant issues. This patient of hers recommended this Terro gel bait. He said it takes a while for it to kill the whole ant mound but it does work very well. We used it and it took a couple of weeks but it worked well and the ants are gone.
customer_reviews.author: Oneida

customer_reviews.title: I keep buying Terro because it works
customer_reviews.text: I like that it doesn't ooze out of its packaging, when used correctly, so that my cat is safe. I like that it works quickly. If I've set it out at night, by the time I get up the next day, the ants have been nearly eradicated. I've given these ant baits to neighbors and friends, who have then purchased them for themselves, because it works and works quickly.
customer_reviews.author: RobertaMc

customer_reviews.title: Apparently I have smart ants
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the carpenter ants infesting my home have figured out that they should avoid this. In fact, they're violently attacking and expelling those workers who've fallen for it. Last year's batch of baits worked perfectly. Within a few days of laying them out, I was ant-free for the remainder of the season and all winter long. This year's a different story, though. They've come back with a vengeance and are protecting their nest fiercely from their compatriots who've drunk the Kool-Aid. I'm at a loss as to what to do about it. The product is fine—it's my ants that're the problem. I was hoping I'd found a solution, but this revelation changes things (as revelations generally do).
customer_reviews.author: Private Name

customer_reviews.title: Effective bait, limited space
customer_reviews.text: The bait is effective in attracting ants. Unfortunately, we may have more ants that we can handle. These little devices capture the ants and fill up fast. Once they're past their capacity, they keep attracting ants, but then the ants wander around the house. They're also extremely difficult to open, and can leak a very sticky liquid all over. If they had a valve in them that would allow things in, but not out, they would be more useful.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Charles

customer_reviews.title: Kills them, but they come back
customer_reviews.text: I keep buying this stuff, because it works. That said, it works temporarily. There must be some massive colonies somewhere, as I can kill smaller colonies for a couple weeks, then new scouts come up in the same area. Within hours of putting the bait down, one bait will get black with tons of ants. After a couple days, they are all gone again. Rinse and repeat. Wish there were a more permanent solution, but this is the only thing I've found that takes care of them when they start coming out.
customer_reviews.author: Rhino Beach Media

customer_reviews.title: Worked..I Think
customer_reviews.text: Placed these in the areas of the house that were getting the spring ant invasion. I was a little concerned as a lot of material I read said that depending on what kind of ants you have, some traps may not be effective. Well, I placed them out and from what I can tell, no more ants. Did they work? I don't know, as these are bait systems. The ants take it back to the nest so, since I do not know where the nest(s) were, I can only assume it worked. I will say, no more ants in the house so, mission accomplished.
customer_reviews.author: Dyane

customer_reviews.title: They work.
customer_reviews.text: Most important thing to remember when using these traps is to set them in the area where you see the ants and just let the trap and the ants do their thing. DO NOT KILL ANTS that you see walking in or around trap. The ants have to partake of the liquid and bring it back to their nest to kill the queen. Usually takes two or three days and nights.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard B.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best ant killer I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best ant killer I've ever used. Every spring we get small ants wandering around our kitchen and sometimes in the upstairs bathroom sink! We have tried numerous traps, baits and sprays with limited success. I put these baits out and, BAM! 2 days later, no ants. This stuff is industrial strength effective. Buy it; it works. The only downside is that the bait boxes have liquid inside them that will pour out if you tip the container towards the open end. You need to be very careful with placement if you have pets or children.
customer_reviews.author: Tin Man

customer_reviews.title: The best stuff to kill ants! No joke!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so this stuff works really really really freaking good. I mean working a week all the ants were bye bye in the middle of the summer.. haven’t seen one since. Had to buy multiple and keep changing them because they go in the liquid and get trapped in there. I mean I will buy this over and over it’s more on the pricey side but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: FlorAmar Product Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Ants Gone
customer_reviews.text: We had an invasion of ants. They were everywhere. We placed these baits everywhere we saw an ant trail and within a few days they were gone. During those couple days it was interesting to watch the ants. Once they ate some of the bait they seemed to stagger as if they were drunk. No more straight lines.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Love the new way to open these
customer_reviews.text: We have always bought these at Lowes for our summertime ant invasions. These were readily available and about the same price and they work like a charm as always. The nice part is you no longer have to use scissors to cut open the bait containers because they now come with a twist off piece. I love that.
customer_reviews.author: SJones

customer_reviews.title: Got ants. Get this and get rid of them once and for all
customer_reviews.text: My neighbor hood has been plagued with ants coming into the house. I had hundreds of ants in my kitchen and dinning room. These ants were attracted to food including my dogs food bowls. Because I have animals in my home, I didn't want to try something poisonous. I tried using lemon, vinegar and peppermint sprays to get rid of them, but it would just kill the ones I saw and they kept coming. I purchased these and placed them around the home and within two days, no more ants. This item works great, If you have an ant problem, this might be the product for you. I'm super happy I purchased this item.
customer_reviews.author: luis a.

customer_reviews.title: I kept replacing it and just getting more ants--so either this is TOO good at attracting them or my ant situation was way ...
customer_reviews.text: It definitely attracted and killed the ants that I have who run a little highway behind my kitchen counter. However, I kept replacing it and just getting more ants--so either this is TOO good at attracting them or my ant situation was way worse than I thought. At least it kept them in one spot rather than all over my counters. If you spill the liquid inside it's really sticky and hard to clean up. I had this around cats and they seemed super attracted to it but didn't try to eat it and I didn't notice any side effects by them being around it.
customer_reviews.author: ZToaster

customer_reviews.title: Do you like ants? Do you think the creepy crawly all ...
customer_reviews.text: Do you like ants? Do you think the creepy crawly all over your housey ants are cute? Do you enjoy seeing them all over your floor? Maybe the walls? Possibly the family dog? Carrying your kids back to their underground lair of doom? If you enjoy them don't buy this. If you despise those darn ants buy this. Kill them. Kill them all. Kill all those ants. Terro liquid bait does that well.
customer_reviews.author: Imagineight

customer_reviews.title: Ant issues.. no more!
customer_reviews.text: If you have an issue with ants this is absolutely a fantastic convenient way of letting this product fix the issue. Put this down the answer find it a trail will form one after the other will sample it and eventually no ants within a day will be in that general location. Hassle free completely proud of this product.
customer_reviews.author: jessie phelps

customer_reviews.title: Got. Rid. Of. Ants.
customer_reviews.text: This has worked better than 3 other ant bait/trap/repel systems we purchased. It even worked better than our pest control guy. The ants go crazy for this juice, crawl over each other and stick their heads in it. Many die in or near the juice, while more travel back and forth. Ultimately, after leaving the bait station in place for 3-4 days..no new ants were coming. After removing the bait station, no new ants have been sighted. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Jones

customer_reviews.title: Get this to Get rid of ALL ANTS!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product!!! We just bought a new home and sadly even though it had a total brand new remodel inside and out it had an infestation of ants right after we moved in!!! We tried sprays, regular Borox, and another ant product with nothing working. Put these out and thousands of ants in it dead within a few days with zero being seen in several days and 2 more boxes left!! Thank you SO MUCH!
customer_reviews.author: 1CrazyLife4Me

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried several different baits and I have to tell you this is the best one I have ever seen I don’t usually leaves reviews but the way this works it just short of a miracle!!! I pour the liquid out onto the counter because my ants are smart and won’t go into the traps. I came back within an hour and I have never seen more ants in my life! Great product I highly recommend this! Buy it now!!
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Ant Traps
customer_reviews.text: Useful product, it works like it should. However you should buy these in a physical store and not Amazon. One of the tubes leaked all over the packages. It arrived mostly empty. No damage in shipping. Amazon shipped it this way. They don’t care.
customer_reviews.author: BillD

customer_reviews.title: The Ant Killing Solution
customer_reviews.text: It's almost frightening how well this product works. I placed one of these on my kitchen counter after seeing some ants in the area. Within fifteen minutes, every ant in the vicinity had collected around the trap. When I went to bed, I thought I'd have a mess of dead ants to clean up in the morning. It ended up being quite the opposite: not a single ant was to be found anywhere in the kitchen. They were gone, and they didn't come back for at least a month. This product works extremely well. My only complaint is that they can be tricky to open without spilling the liquid bait from the inside. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: it works for me in the PNW
customer_reviews.text: I had an ant infestation over the summer, no idea how or why. Laid a bunch of these around and in a few weeks they disappeared. Still have a couple out but I haven't seen any of those buggers since. Found a nest on my drive way and set one of these up. Didn't see any after a week. So glad these worked. The only con is if they spill (my fridge when I pulled it out knocked one over) is a huge pain to clean. I haven't looked into how to clean effectively but ugh it's like sap once it dries.
customer_reviews.author: Jyaku

customer_reviews.title: Kills Ants
customer_reviews.text: Ants lick up the bait and take it back to their little holes where they give it to their queen and all the ants die. Takes about 2 weeks to completely kill a nest, maybe 2-3 traps. However, depending on the time of the year, ant colonies are fairly mobile. You may kill one colony only to have another move in a week later. Eventually, you'll kill all the little bastards.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Strandberg

customer_reviews.title: Caps are not easily torn off
customer_reviews.text: I bought serval boxes from home depot and they worked well to kill ants. So I wanted to buy more from here. The packages came from amazon is quite different from I had before. Normally you only need to twist the caps and they came off easily but not for these packages which are all difficult to get off. I messed up my hands with those liquids! I would never buy fromagain from here.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Kid

customer_reviews.title: Terro T300-3 Ant Killer Liquid Ant Baits
customer_reviews.text: This brand of ant baits is hard to find in local stores sometimes, probably because they work so much better than other brand of baits and sell out quickly. This bait not only kills ants when they eat it, but also the colony when ants carry some back with them. Very good product and is worth far more than the cost.
customer_reviews.author: sgtgene

customer_reviews.title: Same as my pest control service used
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to uses and the same product my pest control company used. I do it myself now, and save the money. Just cut it open and place it where you need it and problem solved. I used it for "sugar" ants in Florida and it works great. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: cue881

customer_reviews.title: The BEST ant bait traps ever
customer_reviews.text: A professional exterminator told me about this brand, and this product. Once you get over how different this product works and watch the ants march to the traps, it's very unique but it totally solved my ant problem in the summer. We can get dreadful ant infestations with the heat, and this is unsurpassed. I'll never use any other product again.
customer_reviews.author: Frisbee

customer_reviews.title: Great at getting rid of all of the ants
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Ants feed on this and take it back to their nest. The number of ants that you continue to see will diminish in a few days as they die off. I have found this option to be MUCH more effective rather than just spraying the ants with an aerosol spray. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: D. Pat

customer_reviews.title: The solution to your ant problems
customer_reviews.text: The ants, summer's plague, have stopped pouring out of my kitchen electrical outlets like the scarabs in The Mummy (starring Brendan Fraser). I can now prepare food in peace and let my dog eat at his leisure without shaking ants from his food. This is 3 boxes with 6 traps per box, so I have more than I need, but it has definitely been effective. Each trap lasted a while. After a few days we saw results. Some ants do crawl in and die, but many make it out to kill their colonies.
customer_reviews.author: EricaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: T300 stops ants spreading all over the house
customer_reviews.text: There is no doubt that Terro T300 is the best ants killer for the house like ours built on top of the ant's nest. We got them all over the house, ground floor, 2nd floor, bath rooms, study rooms, back yards, kitchen and everywhere. I found the most effective way to kill ants fast. I turn this cartridge upside down on Aluminum foil so that T300 liquid spreads and provides more surface to capture as many ants as possible in the shortest possible time. Time is critical because spread surface of T300 gets harder after two to three days. and ants won't stick on them anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Iwai

customer_reviews.title: These things have been a life saver! Ever since ...
customer_reviews.text: These things have been a life saver! Ever since we built our house in 2010 we have had problems with Pharaoh ants (little red buggers that make nests in walkways, driveways etc.). Every summer I'd go to war with these things in my house and every summer I'd lose. Finally stumbled across these last year and I put them everywhere in my house. No more ants. Took less then a week. I've got a stock pile now and I'm ready for this summer!
customer_reviews.author: W15

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Ant Trap
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years and would highly recommend it for folks who have ants that have decided to come into the home during rainy weather or just plain wanted to live in your home - works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: TERRO T300 WORKS!!
customer_reviews.text: TERRO T300 WORKS!! I had Ants, all over in each room. Would Spray and ants are back in a week. Any little crumb, and the parade of ants would start. This product works, ants gone in 2-3 days.
customer_reviews.author: G. Sano

customer_reviews.title: Ants go nuts for this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Amazing how all the ants go crazy over this trap. This is the only product that works for me. Update: again amazing ants love this thing. Added it September 15 and all ants were gone October 7th. So it takes time. Update 4/2020: amazing how many ants are attracted to this trap. First three traps I just zipped locked the ants up. Now I’ll wait to see how long it takes for them to disappear.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Hutchins

customer_reviews.title: must have for summer
customer_reviews.text: Best ant trap out on the market. Highly recommend. Ever since I've started using these I don't see an ant all summer. Better than the dry traps at the store. Great investment. I use them at home and work.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works! I had a bad problem with ants in my hummingbird feeder. After 2 viles, for lack of a better word, I no longer have an ant problem nor have I seen any ants anywhere around my hummingbird feeder.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Kind of amazing. I deal with ants and pantry moths
customer_reviews.text: Took about 24-36 hours but the ant did re-route to the traps! Kind of amazing. I deal with ants and pantry moths. Neither dangerous to health, just a nuisance. I don't get worked up about it, but certainly not something I want to deal with when entertaining guests. Worked as advertised. I was surprised. Growing up ants were always an issue and my father would spray outside to eliminate the source. But the traps have dealt with the only two sources I've found so far, saving me from getting a pump spray and destroying far more ants than I'd like. Really amazing critters! But also, pretty amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Katy A. Orr

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This product works extremely well. The ants were all over my kitchen. I put two of the packets down as soon as I received them and from the next day no ants up till now. by it you want to get rid of your ant problem.
customer_reviews.author: Lucianlady

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Wiped out all the ants slowly but surely! Cut open and tape to the top of your trashcans and watch as ants parade in and out of one of the biggest hotspots and send poison back to their colony. Attracts ants quickly but you can add additional baiting if desired.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Still not sure about these.
customer_reviews.text: I'm still on the fence as to the overall effectiveness of these ant baits as I've purchased more than a handful of them. They appear to drive ants nuts for the first few days, but the ants seem to lose interest shortly thereafter. The same could be said of each bait I put out. Either the baits kill over a really long period of time as the liquid is brought back and shared with the colony, or I just have a HUGE ant colony living under the house we're currently renting.
customer_reviews.author: Phong Ho

customer_reviews.title: Only stuff I'll use for ants
customer_reviews.text: I've tried other products and really wish I found these sooner! I've used these for indoors and out. Ants flock to it and if you have a few traps out your issue will likely be solved in a couple days. I've tried sprays, pellets, other gels, stakes, the list goes on. For me here in the northeast these have worked for the citronella ants that have infested the perimeter of my home.
customer_reviews.author: Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Lives up to the great internet reviews.
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well. In 3 days all the ants in my kitchen were gone. I put out 3 traps, but to use a pun, it was overkill:) 1 or2 would have been enough. The only issue I had with it was that the opening did not touch the counter on the bottom making it harder for the ants to enter. I had to put a small weight on top of the trap to keep it flush with the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Ilana Egner

customer_reviews.title: May they RIP
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! I tried to be nice and used the ECO stuff. Though it did help keep them at bay somewhat, but did not resolve my problems. So tried this stuff and in the two places I had a bad ant problem, they had a major party, family get together and died together! May they RIP The little buggers!
customer_reviews.author: Happy One!

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! It is a little gross at first to see all the ants eating the bait but it works! After a couple days I see no ants at all! Then they crawl in from another opening and I put another bait there and no ants! Best thing to be invented! Hard to clean up off the floor if it is spilled but it is possible.
customer_reviews.author: Jm

customer_reviews.title: Ants love it!
customer_reviews.text: Ants love this stuff and keep coming back for more. The only dead ants I have are greedy guys that got inside the container and got stuck in the gooey mess. Obviously, the queen isn't dead or I wouldn't have a continual stream of her offspring!
customer_reviews.author: Sheba weaves

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for the infestation
customer_reviews.text: I set up a whole bunch of these around the infested areas, and didn’t get rid of any ants. I continued using them as per the instructions for a month, and no visible effect. In the end, I just called pest exterminator and they were gone in a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Indigo

customer_reviews.title: NO MORE ANTS!
customer_reviews.text: These ant bait containers are easy to use, and ants come in droves to sample and take back to their colony. As fast as they appear, not an ant is in sight within 24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: CONNIE BARRON

customer_reviews.title: Saved me from selling my house lol
customer_reviews.text: Every spring we start getting ants inside and outside our house. I hate it it grosses me out so much. two years now we've purchased these traps, put them around the perimeter of our house and the inside of our house. Within 2 weeks, we stop seeing ants all together until the following year. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Hazen

customer_reviews.title: Works like wonder
customer_reviews.text: Brand new home, but kids spill soda then ants show, bug spray company want quite a lot they expect people to pay bill every month like WiFi bill, that’s no good Just buy this. Problem resolved!
customer_reviews.author: Ying Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Had an ant problem. Put a bunch of these ...
customer_reviews.text: Had an ant problem. Put a bunch of these traps around the house away from the dog and cats. Found a pile of dead ants 3 separate times now. All traps were deployed on the first floor of our house and for some reason all the ants are found dead in the basement in the same area. Roughly the circumference of a Frisbee lay a pile of dead ants. Not sure where the nest is/was or why they all chose to die together in a weird circle, but NO MORE ANT PROBLEM!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Blazey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect killer.

customer_reviews.title: Plastic deliciousness
customer_reviews.text: These worked amazing within a day all the ants were gone. I had hundreds of them too and they were nesting in my indoor plants I but these babies out and immediately they seated the little plastic deliciousness and brought it back to the colony and they all disappeared after that. I’ve replaced two of them that were drained completely but haven’t seen a single ant since. If only these things worked on spiders too.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Lavoie

customer_reviews.title: Terro Works Most of the Time
customer_reviews.text: Terro products are very effective against most ants and pests, but they did not work for the pharoah ants that I had. The professional exterminator I hired said that he uses Terro at his own home, but that it is not successful all the time. In the past, I used Terro very successfully, but not this time. Pros: low cost, simple instructions, works on most ants Cons: can be messy, does not work on all ant types
customer_reviews.author: homer

customer_reviews.title: Product seems to work well
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years and it is effective in keeping the ants down. I place the baits near doors and windows where the ants come in and after a week or two, I notice that there are many fewer ants and a lot of dead ones in the baits. I keep these baits around the doors and windows most of the year to keep the ants down. A note of caution: We don't have any small children or pets to worry about them getting into the baits. The package says to keep them in areas inaccessible to pets and small children so considerable thought needs to be given to this.
customer_reviews.author: VA Rich

customer_reviews.title: No More Ants
customer_reviews.text: My ant infestation wasn't horrible in number, but never-the-less unwanted. These traps did the trick! After 3-4 days no more ants in the house. This is the first time I've found ants in the house. I plan on keeping these traps on hand. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Ants gone within a day!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I had been using the raid ant traps and the raid ant gel to tackle my ant problem with no success. I put one of these terro traps out in my kitchen and within an hour the ants were swarming! They were all gone from my kitchen the next day. This doesn't entirely eliminate the ants because I think new groups will pop up every 3weeks but I just put out a new trap and they are gone within a day. Definitely would get this multi-pack again, it's an amazing deal and will get me through an entire spring/summer of dealing with ants.

It took three weeks with one or two replacement traps that filled up. Definitely the permanent go to. RECOMMEND!!!

customer_reviews.text: And they carry away their dead ! Love this stuff. There’s ants then no ants. Not much clean up.

customer_reviews.title: Ants are out of here

Looks like they took the sick and dying back to the nest. So let the ant trails build hundreds will find there way to the traps, let them feast on the clear honey.

I highly recommend to anyone having an ant problem as Raid and other products I've tried were pretty ineffective.

Can get messy if you dont follow instructions but as long as you do what the instructions say, it literally got rid of our ants problem in 24 hours both at the office and at home

Inside the house we had some larger carpenter ants but they totally put their noses up at the stuff and have zero interest, so I must need a different bait for them.

product_meta.title: Terro T300 T300-3 Killer Liquid Ant Baits (3 Pack), 3-Pack
product_meta.description: Size:3-PackAttract and kill the ants you see and the ones you don’t with TERRO Liquid Ant Baits. The liquid, which contains borax, is specifically designed to allow worker ants to consume the product, survive long enough to carry the liquid back to the nest. Ants consume the liquid ant bait and return to the nest where they pass it around to the rest of the colony. The active ingredient in the bait slowly interferes with the ants’ digestive systems, ultimately killing them. Since this is a bait product, you will initially see more ants as they are attracted to the liquid – but don’t worry, this is a good thing. After the bait is consumed, insect populations will begin to decline. Complete control may take up to two weeks. For your convenience, TERRO Liquid Ant Baits are easy to use and feature a new and improved snap-off tab design – no scissors needed! To open the bait, hold the station vertically and twist the new and improved tab. Then place indoors on a flat surface near ant trails and other signs of ant activity. The more bait placements, the better. Be sure to leave the ant baits undisturbed while the ants are actively feeding on it.
feature_bullets: Kills the ants you see and the ones you don’t
Ready to use – set the bait, attract ants, and kill the colony
Stay-fresh tab keeps liquid bait fresh until opened
Snap-off design makes it easy to open – no scissors needed
Use bait stations along baseboard, under appliances, on windowsills and wherever ants are numerous

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars949 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
